ai-tha-ap128:1.3_0: In the marks and the marks,
ai-tha-ap128:1.4_0: and the hairs were full of porches,
ai-tha-ap128:2.2_0: I’m a skilled in the signs,
ai-tha-ap128:2.4_0: a master of the three Vedas:
ai-tha-ap128:3.2_0: I placed the back on my backbone,
ai-tha-ap128:4.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap128:5.4_0: and plunged into my own house.
ai-tha-ap128:6.3_0: I directly gave you the Buddha
ai-tha-ap128:7.1_0: if it is a time for one who abides in died;
ai-tha-ap128:7.2_0: I’ll make a basket out of flowers,
ai-tha-ap128:8.2_0: Then the flower-meater (work) from that gift,
ai-tha-ap128:8.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap128:8.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap128:11.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kusinārā.
ai-tha-ap128:12.1_0: when the sixth year had embarked was embarrassed,
